```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(vroom)
```



```{r}
in_sum = vroom("../versioned_feature/rebuild_inpatient_raw_avg.csv") %>%
  filter(time_value >= as.Date("2020-11-01")) %>%
  filter(issue_date == time_value + 60) %>%
  summarise(total_sum = sum(value_total, na.rm = TRUE),
            covid_sum = sum(value_covid, na.rm = TRUE))


out_sum = vroom("../versioned_feature/rebuild_outpatient_raw_avg.csv") %>%
  filter(time_value >= as.Date("2020-11-01")) %>%
  filter(issue_date == time_value + 60) %>%
  summarise(total_sum = sum(value_total, na.rm = TRUE),
            covid_sum = sum(value_covid, na.rm = TRUE))

```
